ProductDetectedPriceChange.name: ProductDetectedPriceChange
ProductDetectedPriceChange.description: Represents a detected change in price for a product associated with a partner account.

AccountId.description: References the partner account for which the price change was detected.

EffectiveDate.description: Date when the new price becomes effective for the product.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the record was last referenced by the current user. Useful for activity tracking.

LastViewedDate.description: Date and the timestamp the record was last referenced by a user or system process.

Name.description: Unique name or identifier for the price change record.

OwnerId.description: User or group that owns this record. This is a polymorphic relationship field.

ProcessingStatus.description: Indicates the current processing stage of the price change.

ProductId.description: References the product for which the price change was detected.
